### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/TF1_1.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/TF1_1_valid.qmd).

- Indicative Map (**code: TF1.1.IM.alt**, version v3.0) requires more work 
 - Indicative Map (**code: TF1.1.IM.alt**, version v2.1) discarded 
 - Indicative Map (**code: TF1.1.IM.alt**, version v2.0) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: TF1.1.web.mix**, version v2.0) requires review 
 - Indicative Map (**code: TF1.1.IM.mix**, version v2.0) discarded 
 - Indicative Map (**code: TF1.1.IM.mix**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Indicative Map (**code: TF1.1.IM.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: TF1.1.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) in preparation 
 - Web navigation (**code: TF1.1.web.orig**, version v1.0) requires review 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **EarthEnv-LandCover-v1.0** (Tuanmu et al. 2014).
 - **GLWD-2004** (Lehner and Döll 2004).
 - **Nature-Map-2020** (Jung et al. 2020).
 - **Resolve-Ecoregions-2017** (Dinerstein et al. 2017).
 - **Tropical-Wetlands-v2** (Gumbricht et al. 2017).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset                 |url                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|:-----------------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|EarthEnv-LandCover-v1.0 |<https://earthenv.org//landcover>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|GLWD-2004               |<https://www.worldwildlife.org/pages/global-lakes-and-wetlands-database>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                                                |
|Nature-Map-2020         |<https://explorer.naturemap.earth/map>{target='links'} :: <https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3666245>{target='links'} :: <https://github.com/Martin-Jung/Habitatmapping>{target='links'} :: <https://uploads.users.earthengine.app/view/habitat-types-map>{target='links'} |
|Resolve-Ecoregions-2017 |<https://ecoregions2017.appspot.com/>{target='links'} :: <https://geospatial.tnc.org/datasets/7b7fb9d945544d41b3e7a91494c42930_0>{target='links'}                                                                                                                       |
|Tropical-Wetlands-v2    |<http://www.cifor.org/global-wetlands/>{target='links'} :: <https://www.cifor.org/knowledge/dataset/1614/>{target='links'} :: <https://doi.org/10.17528/CIFOR/DATA.00058>{target='links'}                                                                               |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:

**TF1.1.web.mix** (v2.0): [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/TF1.1.web.mix_v2.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"}

**TF1.1.IM.mix** (v2.0): [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934){target="gisdata"}

**TF1.1.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958622){target="gisdata"}

**TF1.1.web.orig** (v1.0): [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/TF1.1.web.orig_topo.json){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset                 |license_info                                                                                                   |
|:-----------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|EarthEnv-LandCover-v1.0 |https://www.re3data.org/repository/r3d100013469 :: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/             |
|GLWD-2004               |The data is available for free download for non-commercial scientific :: conservation and educational purposes |
|Nature-Map-2020         |https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/legalcode                                                          |
|Resolve-Ecoregions-2017 |https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/                                                                   |


:::
:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Martin Jung, Prabhat Raj Dahal, Stuart H. M. Butchart, Paul F. Donald, Xavier De Lamo, Myroslava Lesiv, ... Piero Visconti. (2020). *A global map of terrestrial habitat types* [Data set]. **Zenodo**. DOI: [10.5281/zenodo.3673586](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3673586) 
 - Tuanmu, M.-N. and W. Jetz (2014) *A global 1-km consensus land-cover product for biodiversity and ecosystem modeling* **Global Ecology and Biogeography** 23(9):1031--1045 [DOI:10.1111/geb.12182](http:dx.doi.org/10.1111/geb.12182) 
 - Dinerstein E, Olson D, Joshi A, Vynne C, Burgess ND, Wikramanayake E, Hahn N, Palminteri S, Hedao P, Noss R, Hansen M, Locke H, Ellis EE, Jones B, Barber CV, Hayes R, Kormos C, Martin V, Crist E, Sechrest W, Price L, Baillie JEM, Weeden D, Suckling K, Davis C, Sizer N, Moore R, Thau D, Birch T, Potapov P, Turubanova S, Tyukavina A, de Souza N, Pintea L, Brito JC, Llewellyn Barnekow Lillesø JP, van Breugel P, Graudal L, Voge M, Al-Shammari KF, Saleem M (2017) *An Ecoregion-Based Approach to Protecting Half the Terrestrial Realm*, **BioScience** 67: 534–545. DOI:[10.1093/biosci/bix014](https://doi.org/10.1093/biosci/bix014). [Data-set available on-line](https://ecoregions2017.appspot.com/) 
 - Lehner, B. and Döll, P. (2004): *Development and validation of a global database of lakes, reservoirs and wetlands*. **Journal of Hydrology** 296/1-4: 1-22. [Data-set](https://www.worldwildlife.org/pages/global-lakes-and-wetlands-database) 
 - Thomas Gumbricht Rosa Maria Roman‐Cuesta Louis Verchot Martin Herold Florian Wittmann Ethan Householder Nadine Herold Daniel Murdiyarso (2017) *An expert system model for mapping tropical wetlands and peatlands reveals South America as the largest contributor* **Glob Change Biol.** 23: 3581– 3599 [DOI:10.1111/gcb.13689](http:dx.doi.org/10.1111/gcb.13689)
